aasimar.name: Aasimar
aasimar.description: Aasimar are mortals who carry a spark of the Upper Planes within their souls. They can use that power to wield light, healing energy, and heavenly fury.

traits.celestial_resistance: Celestial Resistance: Resistance to necrotic and radiant damage
traits.healing_hands: Healing Hands: Touch to heal, roll d4 equal to proficiency bonus
traits.light_bearer: Light Bearer: Know the Light cantrip
traits.celestial_revelation: Celestial Revelation (at level 3): Heavenly Wings, Inner Radiance, or Necrotic Shroud

dragonborn.name: Dragonborn
dragonborn.description: Dragonborn ancestors hatched from the eggs of chromatic and metallic dragons. They are wingless, have dragon-like scales, and stand on two legs.

traits.breath_weapon: Breath Weapon: Exhale magical breath in a 15-foot cone or 30-foot line
traits.damage_resistance: Damage Resistance: Based on draconic ancestry
traits.draconic_flight: Draconic Flight (at level 5): Sprout spectral wings for 10 minutes

dwarf.name: Dwarf
dwarf.description: Dwarves were created from earth in the elder days by a god of forge. Stout and often wide, dwarves carved cities and strongholds into mountains.

traits.darkvision: Darkvision: See in darkness up to 120 feet
traits.dwarven_resilience: Dwarven Resilience: Resistance to poison damage and advantage on saves vs poisoned
traits.dwarven_toughness: Dwarven Toughness: Max HP increases by 1 per level
traits.stonecunning: Stonecunning: Bonus action to gain tremorsense 60 feet

elf.name: Elf
elf.description: Created by Corellon, ancient elves could change their form at will. Elves have pointed ears and no facial hair. They can live up to 750 years.

traits.fey_ancestry: Fey Ancestry: Advantage on saves against being charmed
traits.keen_senses: Keen Senses: Proficiency in Insight, Perception, or Survival
traits.trance: Trance: Don't need to sleep, can finish long rest in 4 hours of meditation

drow.name: Drow
drow.description: Drow typically dwell in the Underdark. 120-foot darkvision, know Dancing Lights

high_elf.name: High Elf
high_elf.description: High Elves gain magic from crossing between Feywild and Material Plane. Know Prestidigitation
high_elf.spells: Level 3: Detect Magic | Level 5: Misty Step

wood_elf.name: Wood Elf
wood_elf.description: Wood Elves carry primordial forest magic. Speed 35 feet, know Druidcraft
wood_elf.spells: Level 3: Longstrider | Level 5: Pass without Trace

gnome.name: Gnome
gnome.description: Gnomes are magical creatures created by gods of invention, illusion, and subterranean life. Small with large eyes and pointed ears, they live about 425 years.

traits.darkvision: Darkvision: See in darkness up to 60 feet
traits.gnomish_cunning: Gnomish Cunning: Advantage on INT/WIS/CHA saving throws

forest_gnome.name: Forest Gnome
forest_gnome.description: Know Minor Illusion cantrip and Speak with Animals spell

rock_gnome.name: Rock Gnome
rock_gnome.description: Know Mending and Prestidigitation cantrips. Can create Tiny clockwork devices

goliath.name: Goliath
goliath.description: Goliaths are distant descendants of giants. Each goliath bears traits of their giant ancestry, granting various supernatural abilities.

traits.powerful_build: Powerful Build: Count as one size larger for carrying capacity. Advantage vs grappled
traits.large_form: Large Form (at level 5): Bonus action to become Large for 10 minutes, advantage on STR and +10 speed

fire_giant.name: Fire Giant - Fire's Burn
fire_giant.description: When you hit with attack, deal extra 1d10 fire damage

frost_giant.name: Frost Giant - Frost's Chill
frost_giant.description: When you hit, deal extra 1d6 cold and reduce speed by 10 feet

hill_giant.name: Hill Giant - Hill's Tumble
hill_giant.description: When you hit, knock target prone

stone_giant.name: Stone Giant - Stone's Endurance
stone_giant.description: Reaction to roll 1d12 + CON to reduce damage

storm_giant.name: Storm Giant - Storm's Thunder
storm_giant.description: Reaction to deal 1d8 thunder damage to attacker within 60 feet

halfling.name: Halfling
halfling.description: Guided by gods who cherish life, home, and warmth, halflings prefer peaceful communities where families and friends work together.

traits.brave: Brave: Advantage on saves against being frightened
traits.halfling_nimbleness: Halfling Nimbleness: Move through space of larger creatures
traits.luck: Luck: When you roll a 1 on d20, you can reroll
traits.naturally_stealthy: Naturally Stealthy: Can hide behind creatures larger than you

human.name: Human
human.description: Found throughout the multiverse, humans are diverse and ambitious. Their ambition and innovation are renowned, respected, and feared.

traits.resourceful: Resourceful: Gain Heroic Inspiration when you finish a Long Rest
traits.skillful: Skillful: Proficiency in one skill of your choice
traits.versatile: Versatile: Gain one Origin Feat (recommended: Skilled)

orc.name: Orc
orc.description: Orcs trace their creation to Gruumsh, a powerful god who roams the Material Plane. Gruumsh gifted his children with endurance, determination, and darkvision.

traits.darkvision: Darkvision: See in darkness up to 120 feet
traits.adrenaline_rush: Adrenaline Rush: Bonus action to Dash and gain temp HP equal to proficiency bonus
traits.relentless_endurance: Relentless Endurance: When reduced to 0 HP but not killed, drop to 1 HP instead

tiefling.name: Tiefling
tiefling.description: Tieflings are either born of the Lower Planes or have ancestors who are devils, demons, or other fiends. This fiendish legacy grants power without affecting morality.

traits.darkvision: Darkvision: See in darkness up to 60 feet

abyssal.name: Abyssal Legacy
abyssal.description: The chaos of the Abyss, Pandemonium, and despair of Carceri call to you.
abyssal.spells: Level 3: Ray of Sickness | Level 5: Hold Person

chthonic.name: Chthonic Legacy
chthonic.description: You feel the pull of Carceri, the greed of Gehenna, and the gloom of Hades.
chthonic.spells: Level 3: False Life | Level 5: Ray of Enfeeblement

infernal.name: Infernal Legacy
infernal.description: Your connection links you to Gehenna, the Nine Hells, and the battlefields of Acheron.

acolyte.name: Acolyte
acolyte.equipment: (A) Calligrapher's Supplies, Book (prayers), Holy Symbol, Parchment (10), Robe, 8 GP; or (B) 50 GP
acolyte.desc: You dedicated your life to service in a temple, performing sacred rites to honor a god or pantheon of gods. You served under a priest and learned religious teachings. Thanks to your priest's teachings and your own devotion, you also learned how to channel divine power.

criminal.name: Criminal
criminal.equipment: (A) 2 Daggers, Thieves' Tools, Crowbar, 2 Pouches, Traveler's Clothes, 16 GP; or (B) 50 GP
criminal.desc: You spent your early years in dark alleys, picking pockets or casing shops. You might have been part of a small gang that looked out for each other, or a lone wolf protecting yourself from local gangs and other lawbreakers.

sage.name: Sage
sage.equipment: (A) Quarterstaff, Calligrapher's Supplies, Book (history), Parchment (8), Robe, 8 GP; or (B) 50 GP
sage.desc: You spent years traveling between manors and monasteries, performing odd jobs to gain access to their libraries. You spent most of your time studying books and scrolls, learning ancient lore and knowledge from across the multiverse.

soldier.name: Soldier
soldier.equipment: (A) Spear, Shortbow, 20 Arrows, Gaming Set, Healer's Kit, Quiver, Traveler's Clothes, 14 GP; or (B) 50 GP
soldier.desc: You began training for war as soon as you were old enough, carrying only memories of life before the ranks. War is in your blood. When opportunity presented itself, you used that training on the battlefield, defending your realm through warfare.
